critique: The document is an executive order focused on employing veterans of World War I in public works projects. It emphasizes the creation of a separate, distinctive contingent for veterans within the Emergency Conservation Work program. There is a moderate emphasis on executive power as it is an executive order. The order doesn't directly address economic regulation, immigration, federalism, security/liberty, or social inclusion in a significant way, so those scores are closer to neutral. The ideological tilt is slightly conservative due to the focus on veterans.
